availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: Franklin D. Wade (Simpson County, Kentucky, deputy sheriff)

body.p: Simpson County, Kentucky, deputy sheriff. Kentucky native. Son of Bartlett Wade and Permelia Wade. Married to Sarah J. McElwin Wade in Warren County, Kentucky, on August 1, 1861. Father of Joseph B. Wade. Laborer in Simpson County, Kentucky, in 1850. Deputy sheriff in Simpson County in 1860.

ab.bibl:
Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Simpson County, p. 29B.
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Simpson County, p. 90.
Ninth Manuscript Census of the United States (1870), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Simpson County, Franklin, p. 8A.
Kentucky Marriage Records, Madison County Courthouse, Richmond, Kentucky, Warren County Marriages, Film #000339890, p. 107 (accessed via Ancestry.com).
Find A Grave, "Franklin David Wade (1829-1923)," Memorial #171779336, http://www.findagrave.com/memorial/171779336 (accessed August 28, 2020).
